attractions.name: Warewa Central Market
attractions.description: The largest traditional market in Ogun state, offering local crafts, fresh produce, and authentic Nigerian cuisine.

attractions.name: Alowonle Block Industry
attractions.description: Popular producers of Blocks for construction

attractions.name: Yoruba Cultural Center
attractions.description: Dedicated to preserving and showcasing Yoruba heritage through art, music, and traditional performances.

attractions.name: City View Estate
attractions.description: Beautiful riverside park perfect for picnics, fishing, and enjoying nature along the Ogun River.

attractions.name: Adire Craft Village
attractions.description: Traditional textile center where you can watch artisans create beautiful Adire fabric using ancient techniques.

attractions.name: Warewa Museum of History
attractions.description: Museum showcasing the rich history of Warewa from pre-colonial times to modern development.

attractions.name: Oba's Palace
attractions.description: Historic palace of the traditional ruler, featuring stunning Yoruba architecture and royal artifacts.

attractions.name: Tropical Botanical Gardens
attractions.description: Lush gardens featuring native Nigerian flora, walking trails, and educational exhibits about local ecosystems.
